Trainings.Name: Welcome To AEFC
Trainings.Description: This is the introduction to the trainings feature in AEFC! Add +1 Overall to any player up to 80 rated and learn how to improve your favourite players!

Trainings.Name: Original Aura
Trainings.Description: Bring your favourite Origins player with a maximum of 84 ovr from any position into its true origins with 86 ovr upgrades to be on the next level.

Trainings.Name: Bronze Beast
Trainings.Description: Turn your favourite bronze player from any position into a beast with enough upgrades to be on the same level as the best in the world!

Trainings.Name: Winning Winger
Trainings.Description: Train your LW or RW into a winner! Including upgrades to make you able to outrun the opposing defender and score the winning goal for your club.
